name: Invoices by Customer
author: MCI Desarrollo

sections.description:
Obtain quarterly summary, annual summary and list of invoices per client that exceed a user-selectable amount.
It is necessary to have installed the WooCommerce PDF Invoices & Packing Slips plugin.
You can choose up to 5 years ago and the amount you want to generate the listings.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “Invoices by Customer” plugin to the / wp-content / plugins / or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Access the plugin through the “Menu->Woocommerce->Invoices by Customer” to generate the listings
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.3

1.0.2

  • Fixed issue with text centering css style

1.0.1

  • Fixed error in readme. License URI.

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Obtain a list of invoices by quarter and year for customers who exceed a certain amount.
description:
Obtain quarterly summary, annual summary and list of invoices per client that exceed a user-selectable amount.
It is necessary to have installed the WooCommerce PDF Invoices & Packing Slips plugin.
You can choose up to 5 years ago and the amount you want to generate the listings.

screenshots.caption: Select the minimum annual billing amount per customer and choose the year.
List invoiced by customer, quarter and year. Also detailed listing of all invoices per customer.
